commands.name: az eventhubs namespace replica add
commands.summary: Add one or more Replica properties to a namespace.
examples: az eventhubs namespace replica add --namespace-name mynamespace -g MyResourceGroup --geo-data-replication-config role-type=Secondary location-name=mylocation cluster-arm-id=/subscriptions/{mysubcriptionid}/resourceGroups/{myResourcegroup}/providers/Microsoft.EventHub/clusters/{clustername}

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace replica remove
commands.summary: Remove one or more Replica properties to a namespace.
examples: az eventhubs namespace replica remove --namespace-name mynamespace -g MyResourceGroup --geo-data-replication-config role-type=Secondary location-name=mylocation cluster-arm-id=/subscriptions/{mysubcriptionid}/resourceGroups/{myResourcegroup}/providers/Microsoft.EventHub/clusters/{clustername}
